briefdescription.para: Type-erased base pointers to different diagnostic values.
Apply a function to each base diagnostic in a consistent order across all nodes.

parameterdescription.para: function to apply that takes detail::DiagnosticBase

briefdescription.para: Pre-diagnostic hook; this fires before finalize but after all work is done and the system is about to shut down.

detaileddescription.para: is typically used to compute some final timings that the system might use to output time-based diagnostic metrics

simplesect.para: Components can rely on this being called exactly once in the lifecycle

briefdescription.para: Register a new diagnostic counter with default type.

parameterdescription.para: unique key for diagnostic, should match across nodes
description of the diagnostic value
the unit type for this diagnostic

briefdescription.para: Register a new diagnostic gauge with default type.

parameterdescription.para: unique key for diagnostic, should match across nodes
description of the diagnostic value
the unit type for this diagnostic

briefdescription.para: Register a new diagnostic timer with default type.

description of the diagnostic value

description of the diagnostic value
the unit type for this diagnostic

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string const &key, std::string const &desc, DiagnosticUpdate update, DiagnosticUnit unit=DiagnosticUnit::Units, DiagnosticTypeEnum type=DiagnosticTypeEnum::PerformanceDiagnostic, T initial_value={})
memberdef.name: registerDiagnostic

parameterdescription.para: unique key for diagnostic, should match across nodes
description of the diagnostic value
the update operator that is applied for updateDiagnostic
the unit type for this diagnostic
the type of diagnostic being registered
the initial value for the diagnostic

briefdescription.para: Update the current diagnostic value for a particular key.

detaileddescription.para: the update will be applied depends on the DiagnosticUpdate that was registered when the diagnostic was created:
DiagnosticUpdate::Sum : Accumulate up the values DiagnosticUpdate::Avg : Average the values DiagnosticUpdate::Replace : Replace the existing value with each update

parameterdescription.para: unique key for diagnostic, should match across nodes
the value to apply the updater to

briefdescription.para: The abstract Diagnostic trait for outputting debugging state information generically across VT components.
